about_the_game:
Beastbound is a Roguelike / Monster Tamer fusion that takes inspirations from card based dungeon-crawlers, and fan-made challenges of other monster tamer games.



Within each run you will be offered different Beasts, different items and encounter different events that will provide you with a unique experience each time. Try different combinations, expand your team and do the best of your limited resources.





Your Beasts retain their health between each battle! Tread carefully and take care of your team, each decision you make can affect the fate of your Beasts!



Choose amongst the ranks of items and artifacts designed to complement various play-styles and shift your gameplay experience fundamentally.



Face bosses that adapt, shift and take different forms depending on your decisions in battle and on the overworld map, or on the luck of the run!

Join Out Discord To Learn About Updates

We are always adding new content, trying experimental optional features and polishing the ame, join our discord to be notified of updates the moment they drop!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
